title: AMACO Velvet Underglaze, Pint, Purple V-322, Each
description: AMACO Velvet Underglaze in purple color comes in a plastic jar of 1 pint capacity and can be intermixed to create a palette of hundreds of colors. Non-Toxic glaze gives soft, satin matte finish when glazed with transparent matte glaze and will intensify in color when covered with clear transparent gloss glaze.

title: How to Make Pinch Bowls
These are so helpful and cute! A little bit goes a long way
